title: Bug 110566: Wrong data set result returned when setting an invalid filter expression on row[0]
description: When setting a filter like "row[0] equals to 0", the result set is incorrect or returns null.
OB: When setting an invalid filter expression on row[0], the result set does not display any relevant error message.
EB: When setting an invalid filter expression on row[0], a relevant error message should be displayed.
SR:
To reproduce the issue, follow these steps:
1. Open the dataset.
2. Set the filter expression of row[0] to "equals to 0".
3. Observe that the result set is incorrect or null.
4. Verify that a relevant error message is displayed when an invalid filter expression is set.
